aboutMe.description:
Hello! I'm {{name}}, a Computer Science Engineer with experience in developing informatics solutions. Specialized in web development with <primary>JavaScript (Node), React, Next.js</primary> and <primary>PHP</primary>, with strong knowledge in <primary>frontend, backend and databases</primary>. I've worked on projects that require scalability, quality and development best practices.
With a fullstack vision, I create robust technical solutions focused on innovation and promoting informatization processes. I'm motivated by continuous learning, teamwork and solving complex problems effectively.

service_1.title: Front-End Development
service_1.description: Modern and responsive web applications with React.js, Next.js, and TypeScript, optimized for an excellent user experience on any device.

service_2.title: Back-End Development
service_2.description: Scalable and secure APIs with Node.js and PHP, focused on data management, authentication, and business logic.

service_3.title: Full Stack Development
service_3.description: Complete solutions integrating front-end (React, Next.js) and back-end (Node.js, PHP) with PostgreSQL databases and development best practices.

service_4.title: PostgreSQL Databases
service_4.description: Design and implementation of robust and optimized databases with PostgreSQL, including complex queries and efficient data management.

service_5.title: Docker and Containerization
service_5.description: Application containerization with Docker to ensure consistency between development, testing, and production environments.

service_6.title: Version Control
service_6.description: Professional source code management with Git and GitLab, following best practices for collaboration and project versioning.

service_7.title: Responsive Design
service_7.description: Modern and adaptable interfaces with HTML, CSS, Tailwind CSS and best practices in UX/UI for all platforms and devices.

skill_1.title: Communication
skill_1.description: Clear and effective communication with technical and non-technical stakeholders, ensuring understanding and alignment in projects.

skill_2.title: Teamwork
skill_2.description: Collaborative work in multidisciplinary teams, contributing to shared goals and fostering a positive work environment.

skill_3.title: Problem Solving
skill_3.description: Analytical approach to identifying and resolving complex technical challenges with creative and efficient solutions.

skill_4.title: Adaptability
skill_4.description: Quick adaptation to new technologies, methodologies, and changing project requirements in dynamic environments.

skill_5.title: Time Management
skill_5.description: Efficient organization of tasks and priorities to meet deadlines while maintaining quality standards.

standard.title: Standard Plan
standard.description: For web applications with APIs and databases.

enterprise.title: Enterprise Plan
enterprise.description: For Web3, blockchain, and large-scale projects.
